t=int(raw_input())
for i in range(t):
    inp=map(int,raw_input().split())
    a=inp[0]
    b=inp[1]
    a1=a
    b1=b
    n=0
    while(a>0):
        a=a/10
        n=n+1
    af=0

    while(n>0):
        af=af+((a1%10)*(10**(n-1)))
        n=n-1
        a1=int(a1/10)
    m=0
    while(b>0):
        b=b/10
        m=m+1
    bf=0
    while(m>0):
        bf=bf+((b1%10)*(10**(m-1)))
        m=m-1
        b1=b1/10

    c=af+bf
    c1=c
    l=0
    while(c>0):
        c=c/10
        l=l+1
    cf=0
    while(l>0):
        cf=cf+((c1%10)*(10**(l-1)))
        l=l-1
        c1=c1/10

    print cf
